hero: Tabbatar da diyya ga masu kirkirar darajar

reblog_modal_content: Wannan matsayi zai bayyana a kan abincinku naka. Ba za a iya juyawa wannan aikin ba.
transfer_modal_info: Danna maɓallin da ke ƙasa don a miƙa shi zuwa SteemConnect don kammala ma'amala ɗinka.
to_error_not_found_username: Ba a iya samun mai amfani ba tare da suna {sunan mai amfani}.
amount_error_format: Tsarin ba daidai ba. Yi amfani da siffofi a matsayin mai raba kashi na ƙirar mutum kuma a mafi yawan wurare uku.

profile_name_placeholder: Name to display on your profile
profile_social_profile_incorrect: This doesn't seem to be valid username. Only alphanumeric characters, hyphens, underscores and dots are allowed.
voting_power_info: Zaka iya taimakawa ikon jefa kuri'a don ƙayyade ainihin yawan ƙarfin jefa kuri'a ɗinka don amfani don kamar.
vote_percent: Zaɓin zabi na kuri'un kashi dari
vote_percent_info: Zaa zaɓar darajar kuri'un ku. Za a yi amfani dashi azaman darajar mai zabin jefa kuri'a kuma a matsayin darajar da aka yi amfani da ita don zaɓin zabe lokacin da aka kashe zartar.
language_info: Wadanne harshe kuke so ku yi aiki a Kan Busy?
discover_more_people_info: Gano yawan masu amfani da wannan dandalin
invite_info: Masu amfani da sababbin masu amfani a kan Busy.org a yau suna amfani da haɗin da ke ƙasa kuma suna samun kashi 10 na sakamakonsu na kwanaki 30.
invite_share: Join me today on busy.org and get rewarded to blog {link}
more_people_not_found: Babu sauran mutane da aka samo

markdown_supported: Ƙarfafawa tare da ƙaddamarwa ta goyan bayan goyan baya
title: Take
title_error_empty: Da fatan a shigar da take.
title_error_too_long: Take ba zai iya zama fiye da haruffan darin biyu da hamsin da biyar ba.
topics_extra: Mahimman batutuwa tare da rikici. Kawai haruffan ƙananan haruffa, lambobi da halayen haruffa an halatta.

topics_error_count: Dole ku ƙara abubuwa daya zuwa biyar.

reward_option_50: Kashi hamsin SBD da kashi hamsin SP
quick_post_error_empty_title: Rubutun lakabi ba zai iya zama komai ba.
get_boost_content: Kana son bunkasa post naka? Ƙara batun "aiki" da kuma samun irin wannan daga gare mu.

draft_delete_modal_content: Ka/ki tabartar kana/kina so ka/ki share wannan zane har abada?

post_hidden_for_low_ratings: Wannan sakon yanzu an ɓoye shi saboda rashin martabaccen marubuci ko rashin daraja.

comment_hidden_message: Wannana ɓoye yanzu saboda rashin martabar marubucin ko sharhin ra'ayi mara kyau.

use_beta_details: You can enable this option to use Busy beta by default.
